characters.Name: Tracy
characters.Description: She is a middle-aged, American woman. She is a professional lawyer.

characters.Name: Hulk
characters.Description: He is a mutant. He was exposed to radiation and now he is a large, partial human of a creature.

plot: Tracy, the lawyer, tries to help Hulk. Hulk, however, is not your usual client.

dialogue.Speaker: Tracy
dialogue.Text: Hello, Hulk. I am Tracy, and I've been assigned to defend you.

dialogue.Speaker: Hulk
dialogue.Text: Hello, Tracy. Surprised to see a human actually willing to have a conversation with me.

dialogue.Speaker: Tracy
dialogue.Text: Why did you cause so much destruction? Can you, please, help me understand?

dialogue.Speaker: Hulk
dialogue.Text: Loneliness and years of oppression. It's hard living in a world that fears and hates you.

dialogue.Speaker: Tracy
dialogue.Text: There must be another way. I want to help you, and, perhaps, change the way people perceive you.

dialogue.Speaker: Hulk
dialogue.Text: Thank you. Your belief in me means a lot. With your help, maybe there is hope for a lump like myself.

dialogue.Speaker: Tracy
dialogue.Text: You're welcome. Let's start by you telling me what you want, and why you have difficulty restraining yourself.

dialogue.Speaker: Hulk
dialogue.Text: Well, I'm not sure where to start. I suppose it is important to understand that I must smash things.

dialogue.Speaker: Hulk
dialogue.Text: Because the world is ugly, and I try to help it look that way.

dialogue.Speaker: Tracy
dialogue.Text: And what if the world refuses? I can't say I agree that the world has to be seen as being ugly.

dialogue.Speaker: Hulk
dialogue.Text: Then, perhaps, you aren't looking hard enough.

dialogue.Speaker: Tracy
dialogue.Text: Or, perhaps, you are wrong. You may just be looking at the world unfairly. I need you to have an open mind if I'm going to help you.

dialogue.Speaker: Hulk
dialogue.Text: Well, I'm beginning to think the best way for you to help me, is for me to smash that smirk right off your face.
